00009   function dbiSelect()
00010   {
00011     mysqli_init();
00012     $link = mysqli_connect(DB_HOST, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, DB_DATABASE) or exit(mysqli_error($link));
00013 
00014     return $link;
00015   }

00017   function isValidURL($url)
00018   {
00019         return preg_match('|^http(s)?://[a-z0-9-]+(.[a-z0-9-]+)*(:[0-9]+)?(/.*)?$|i', $url);
00020   }
00021 
00022   function url_exists($url)
00023   {
00024         $handle = @fopen($url, "r");
00025         if ($handle === false)
00026                 return false;
00027         fclose($handle);
00028         return true;
00029   }
00030   
00031   function clean_num($num)
00032   {
00033         return rtrim(rtrim($num, '0'), '.');
00034   }
00035 
00036   function varStore($varname, $vardefault)
00037   {
00038     if (!isset($_SESSION[$varname]))
00039     {
00040       //DEBUG:
00041       //echo "INFO: <b>" . $varname . "</b> STORED IN SESSION WITH " . $vardefault . "<br>";
00042       $_SESSION[$varname] = $vardefault;
00043     }
00044 
00045     if (isset($_POST[$varname]))
00046     {
00047       //DEBUG:
00048       //echo "INFO: <b>" . $varname . "</b> STORED IN SESSION FROM POST WITH " . $_POST[$varname] . "<br>";
00049       $_SESSION[$varname] = $_POST[$varname];
00050     }
00051     else
00052     {
00053       //DEBUG:
00054       //echo "INFO: <b>" . $varname . "</b> STORED IN POST FROM SESSION WITH " . $_SESSION[$varname] . "<br>";
00055       $_POST[$varname] = $_SESSION[$varname];
00056     }
00057   }

00128   function write_stats($link, $page)
00129   {
00130     $userid = $_SESSION["user_id"];
00131 
00132     $query = "INSERT INTO users_statistics SELECT NULL, " .
00133              $userid . ", id, NOW() FROM pages_list WHERE name='" .
00134              $page . "' LIMIT 1";
00135 
00136     mysqli_query($link, $query);
00137   }

00140   function set_message($message, $type)
00141   {
00142     $_SESSION[$type] = $message;
00143   }

00146   function show_message()
00147   {
00148     if (isSet($_SESSION["message"]))
00149     {
00150       print "<FIELDSET class ='message'>" . $_SESSION["message"] . "</FIELDSET><P>" . LF;
00151       unSet($_SESSION["message"]);
00152     }
00153     else if (isSet($_SESSION["warning"]))
00154     {
00155       print "<FIELDSET class ='warning'>" . $_SESSION["warning"] . "</FIELDSET><P>" . LF;
00156       unSet($_SESSION["warning"]);
00157     }
00158     else if (isSet($_SESSION["error"]))
00159     {
00160 //      ini_set("SMTP", MAIL_SMTP);
00161 //
00162 //      $to = "DHConsultancy@skynet.be";
00163 //      $subject = "Europlanet catalogue error";
